ActOther Than Statutory Authority
PrecisAppointment of MARGO L. NIGHTINGALE of Yellowknife, Northwest Territories, to be a member of the Independent Judicial Advisory Committee for the Northwest Territories, to hold office during pleasure for a term ending on August 1, 2021.
